About Me

BIO

Hi! I'm Junaid (pronounced "June-aid"), a web designer and cross-platform programmer with experience in a wide range of disciplines. My current project involves enhancing the digital user experience at Nafa Engineering, a woman-owned small business and engineering firm based in Oklahoma City.

I possess a Bachelors in Business Administration from Kent State University and also have the full stack web development boot camp certificate from Case Western Reserve University in my educational repertoire. My professional career is focused exclusively on creating beautiful responsive content for companies and freelance clients. When I am not working, I enjoy spending my time riding my bike, kayaking and working out.

Please feel free to reach out to me regarding any of your web development needs. I promise prompt, satisfactory and top quality deliverables. I am always available to discuss your project over the phone, email or via Skype. I look forward to hearing from you soon!
